name: Dice Arena (digonalmeida)
description:
Roll your dice, and hit weaker dices. But be careful, your situation may change on every roll of the dice.

Use arrow key(or W, A, S and D), or the joystick to move your dice on the arena. Hitting anything will re roll the dice.

When two dices hit each other, only the one with the highest number will survive. Destroy as many dices you can.

This is an entry for the GMTK Game Jam. I didn't have much time to work on it, but I wanted to make a simple game to participate and learn Godot engine
